trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZF005_05153_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Dorian's uncertainty is palpable.
TEXT_KINGZF005_05153_TODO_00<tab>Find the ill-fated hunter and defeat any monsters which threaten him.
TEXT_KINGZF005_05153_DORIAN_000_000<tab>Pardon me, adventurer, but might I trouble you to lend me your aid? I've found myself in a rather troublesome predicament.
TEXT_KINGZF005_05153_DORIAN_000_001<tab>Earlier today, we were sent a soldier and asked to test out its improved combat functionality.

TEXT_KINGZF005_05153_DORIAN_000_002<tab>I asked a hunter to take it out on patrol, but not long afterwards, I lost contact with them completely. I know the signal is weak out there, but I can't help but worry something might have gone terribly wrong...
TEXT_KINGZF005_05153_DORIAN_000_003<tab>From the look of you, you can handle your fair share of danger, yes? Could you go out to the Thunderyards and see if you can find them for me?
TEXT_KINGZF005_05153_DORIAN_000_004<tab>Last I heard, the hunter was headed to the Thunderyards. I pray you can find them!
TEXT_KINGZF005_05153_HUNTERS05153_000_005<tab>You saved my life... For a moment there, I thought I'd have to use my regulator!
TEXT_KINGZF005_05153_HUNTERS05153_000_006<tab>Now, I somehow doubt an adventurer like you just so happened to be passing through. That researcher sent you to find me, didn't he?
TEXT_KINGZF005_05153_HUNTERS05153_000_007<tab>I'd better head back to explain what happened. You may as well come and join me─I'm sure he'll want to know you're safe.
TEXT_KINGZF005_05153_DORIAN_000_008<tab>The hunter told me everything. From the bottom of my heart, thank you for taking such swift action!

TEXT_KINGZF005_05153_DORIAN_000_009<tab>These soldiers require energy gathered from lightning, and yet lightning also proves to be their weakness. Apparently, it took a nasty jolt in the Thunderyards and went berserk.

TEXT_KINGZF005_05153_DORIAN_000_010<tab>Honestly, why are they tinkering with offensive output when they could be correcting this glaring flaw in the design? Rest assured, the engineer in charge will hear <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> about this in my report...
TEXT_KINGZF005_05153_DORIAN_000_011<tab>Sorry for the trouble. I hope this small token will suffice as compensation.
